mema “klarans nirmana” gi albamaya sangithawath kara aththe nawa parapure sangithagnyayeku wana nandun rathnayakaya.wijewardhana pawule sadambara idiripath kirimak lesin mema 15 wanida sawasa 7 ta miyusiyas widyaliya shrawanagaraye di pawathwena “klarans githopahara” prasangaye di klaransge nirmana gayanayata anjalin da lanarol gunathilaka, ti. em. jayarathna, saman da silwa, warnan perera, ranil mallawaaarachchi, chandani hettiaarachchi, athula adhikari, shyam fonseka, winslo siks, saman rathnawira saha damayantha kuruppu athulu nawa parapure janapi්raya gayaka gayikawan kihipa deneku da ekwana athara prasangaya sangithawath karanu labanne “wishan” wisin ya.

Òkolambaa gihin rakiya kirimen masekata rupiyal hathalis dahasak pamana upayanne paya 12 kata wadi kalayak sewaya kirimen .ee mudalin kotasak bodmatath , kamatath, manga wiyadamatath wiyadam wupasu ithiriwena sochchama edineda pirimaha ganimata athi, me nisa mama hithuwa thaththage kuda mi kiri welendama diyunu karaganima honda aayojanayak bawa, mokada apita honda rasayath kiri nishpadanaya kirime hakiyawak thibena nisa.

prashnagatha bandumkara ganudenuwa magin parpachuwal tresharis aayathanayata mulyawasi dekak siduwi athi bawath, eyin ru.mi. 688kata wadi mudalak 2015 pebarawari 27 dina prathamika welendapala thulinuth, ru.mi. 11,000kata wadi mudalak ethan sita masa 05k thula dwithika welendapala thulinuth owun upayagena athi bawa warthawa penwadi atha.meyin rajayata siduwu ru.mi. 688kata aasanna mulya alabhaya yanu adala bandumkara nikuthuwa ru.bi. 2.6kata sima kaෙl nam “walakwagatha hakiwa thibu asthamenthugatha awasiya” lesa wiganakadhipathiwaraya handunagath mudalayi.
mema galehi hadaya wanara muhunak wage swabhawayak thamayi ganne.
dan ithin parampara paratharaya hewath jenareshan gap eka athi wenawa.
hamo tama puluwan dukata karadarayakata path wechchi aya diha ane apoyi kiyala anukampawa upadagena ee ayata pihita wenna.
harisan dakwu adahas.

eeth hama welawema wage sithu de thibiyadi nosithu deyama wana swabhawayama ada mata nawathath mage as issarahama dakinna lakhenawa...

ee nisawenma apa sapa yayi kiyana sama deyakma duk sahagatha swabhawayen yuktha yayi unwahansege deshanawanhi daknata labe.budunwahanse awabodha karagaththe ledawena, mahaluwena, marena, ninda apahasa labena masi maduru, awwasi aadingen duk windina kayak hadagena ebandu kayata labena me sapaya sapayak nowana lesaya.

thibuna tipowa matha amuthu deyak siddha wenna patangaththa.
jiwithe therum ganiddi me wishaya nowena karana ekka ottu wime palaya mokakda?

sirisena janadhipathiwaraya hitapu aarakshaka lekam sambandhayen kala prakashayak alla ganimin hathara athe sirisena pathuru gasu purawasi balaya pirimi nars nohoth ranilge saman rathnapriya badumkara ganudenuwa haraha hora ka arjun,ranil gana wachanayak nokiya hik miyeku lesa sitime rahasa apa warthakaru anawaranaya kala.

namudu shri lankawa wisin ohuta dakwu gaurawaya wuye wasara gananawakata pasu ohu wenuwen nikuth karana lada thapal muddarayayi. 1998 engalanthaye worwikshayarhi di dankan wayit melowin samugaththeya.
aththe "nahe" ya.
ithin, eya mehata aawahama, kisima kalabalayak karanna epa, harida?
shri lankawata erehi test satana sandaha nawasilantha balaaniya nam karayi labana desambar 15 wana da aarambha wimata niyamitha nawasilantha – shri lanka test…
me mohothe pramukha ma deshapalana karyaya wanne deshapalaka sorunta, aparadhakaruwanta, yuda aparadha kalawunta danduwam kirima pamanakayi kiwa no haka.
ithin godak mama pawichchi karanne kochchiya...
anek parshwaye gaurawaya labannata oonama bharyawak menma swamipurushayekda kamathiya.
‘sandhya, udaya’ kiyala podi nawa kathawakuth ee kale man rachana kala.
owun meya handunwanne, “wiwaha bandhanagaraya” namini.
akke blog eka tikak bara wadiyi.ane oya tharu watena eka, ganu lamayawa, pahalata duwana keti maga ehema ayin karanna puluwannam mita wada bara adu weyi.
agramathya ranil wikramasinha mahatha shri lanka mirar karthru kalum shiwantha wisin asana lada prashnayakata pilithuru dun ayuru chayarupaye dakwe.
hadana ge ...

mema thantha්ra maruwa sandaha dakshinanshika eksath jathika pakshaya wata wyaja wama paksha saha purawasi balaya wani madhyama panthika wyapara pela gaswa ganime di sobhitha itukala ‘purogami saha kendriya bhumikawa’ ta kruthawedithwaya pala karanu was pasugiya agosthuwe di shi්ra lankawe hitapu eksath janapada thanapathini michel sison naga wiharayata kala wishesha sancharaya pudumayata karunak nowe.
